title: Docker Access
content: Request Access through the Okta access request portal. If you have completed and you have received a slack message letting you know that you have access. Go to step 2. Refresh your Okta dashboard and look for the tile below. [Image] This will take you to the Docker sign in page. You can also navigate directly to hub.docker.com Okta cannot authenticate you directly into Docker because of a limitation on the Docker side. [Image] Click the Sign in button in the upper right hand corner. The first time you sign in, the page will look like this below, enter your simplifi email address and click continue. Okta will then authenticate your account. [Image] The next time you sign in, it will save your email address. [Image]
